resources.string: The information you entered is not valid. Please try again.
Your Blood Pressure Indicates Stage 1 Hypertension
Your Blood Pressure Indicates Stage 2 Hypertension
You Blood Pressure Indicates a Hypertensive Crisis. Please seek medical assistance.

These guidelines are based on recommendations from the American Stroke Association. The American Stroke Association is a national voluntary health agency to help reduce disability and death from cardiovascular diseases and stroke. Click the link below for more information.
